Comments
========

For the categories Projects, Contracts and Employee itÂ´s possible to save
commentaries. Commentaries are build of a free text and the possibility, to add
some files. Commentaries are generally just assigned to a object and save the
author and the publishing date automatically.

Comments own a simple formula, which contains a field for free text and a
dialogue to umpload some files. Comments appear always in the detail view from
